about.tagline: More than FTP. A complete developer toolkit.

ai.apiKeyNotConfigured: API key not configured for {provider}. Open AI Settings to add one.
ai.disclaimer: AI may make mistakes. Double-check code.

error.authFailed: Authentication failed. Check your API key in AI Settings.
error.modelNotFound: Model not found. Check your model name in AI Settings.
error.networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection and provider URL.
error.noProvider: Make sure you have configured an AI provider in settings.
error.rateLimited: Rate limited by the provider. Wait a moment and try again.
error.toolsNotSupported: This model does not support tool use. Disable "Tools" for this model in AI Settings → Models.

ai.errorAuth: Authentication failed. Check your API key in AI Settings.
ai.errorDefault: Make sure you have configured an AI provider in settings.
ai.errorModelNotFound: Model not found. Check your model name in AI Settings.
ai.errorNetwork: Network error. Check your internet connection and provider URL.
ai.errorRateLimit: Rate limited by the provider. Wait a moment and try again.
ai.executeApproval: I want to execute **{tool}**. Approve or cancel:

geminiCache.description: Large system prompts and contexts (32K+ tokens) are automatically cached for 5 minutes, reducing latency and cost by up to 75% on subsequent requests.
geminiCache.title: Context Caching

ai.noModelSelected: No model selected. Click ⚙️ to configure a provider.
ai.noProvidersConfigured: No AI providers configured. Click ⚙️ to add one.
ai.rateLimitReached: Rate limit reached for {provider}. Try again in {seconds}s.

settings.addProviderFirst: Add a provider first to manage models
settings.addProviderHint: Add a provider above to get started
settings.advancedDescription: Configure advanced AI parameters for response generation.
settings.autoRoutingDescription: Automatically select the best model for each task type
settings.autoRoutingInstruction: Configure which model to use for each task type. When auto-routing is enabled, the AI will automatically select the appropriate model based on the task.
settings.autoRoutingTip: Tip: Leave as "Auto (Default)" to use the model selected in the chat header. Configure specific models only when you want different models for different tasks.
settings.contextCachingDesc: Large system prompts and contexts (32K+ tokens) are automatically cached for 5 minutes, reducing latency and cost by up to 75% on subsequent requests.
settings.macrosCustomNote: Custom macro creation will be available in a future update. Currently showing built-in macros.
settings.macrosDescription: Macros are reusable multi-step tool sequences. They appear as tools in AeroAgent's available actions.
settings.maxResponseHelp: Higher values allow longer responses but use more API credits.
settings.noModelsFound: No models found. Is Ollama running?
settings.overrideSystemPrompt: Override the default AeroAgent system prompt
settings.pluginCreateHint: Create a folder with a plugin.json manifest in the plugins directory
settings.pluginsDesc: Extend AeroAgent with custom tools. Place plugin folders in the app plugins directory.
settings.promptDesc: Customize the system prompt that defines AeroAgent's behavior and personality.
settings.styleHelp: Precise = factual responses. Creative = more imaginative. Balanced = default.
settings.thinkingBudgetDesc: Token budget for extended thinking (Claude, o3, Gemini). Higher values allow deeper reasoning.
settings.title: AI Settings

ai.speechNotSupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser.

streamingTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for a streaming response before timing out.
streamingTimeout.hint: Increase this value when using extended thinking budgets (50K+ tokens). Range: 30-600 seconds.
streamingTimeout.title: Streaming Timeout

templates.analyzeUi: Analyze UI screenshot for layout, accessibility, and UX issues
templates.performance: Analyze code for performance bottlenecks and optimization

webSearch.description: Allow the AI to search the web for current information. Supported by Kimi (Moonshot) and Qwen (Alibaba).
webSearch.providerNote: Only active when using Kimi or Qwen providers. Other providers ignore this setting.
webSearch.title: Web Search

ai.welcome: Your AI-powered FTP assistant. I can help you manage files, analyze code, and execute operations.

batchRename.conflictWarning: Some files would have the same name. Please adjust the pattern.
batchRename.title: Batch Rename

browser.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
browser.deleteConfirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {count} items?
browser.editPathHint: Click to edit path, Enter to navigate
browser.localPathMismatch: Local path doesn't match the connected server
browser.name: Name

cloud.cloudNameDesc: Custom name displayed in the tab
cloud.publicUrlDesc: Set this to enable "Share Link" for files. Your web server must serve files from the same path as your FTP remote folder.
cloud.syncIntervalDesc: How often to sync files in the background
cloud.title: AeroCloud

connection.aerocloudConfigured: AeroCloud is already configured and syncing
connection.aerocloudDesc: Turn any FTP server into your personal cloud with automatic sync
connection.aerocloudHelp: You can also configure AeroCloud from the status bar
connection.filenEncryptionDesc: All files are encrypted client-side with AES-256-GCM before upload. Filen cannot access your data. Your password never leaves this device.

fourshared.createAppInstructions: Create a developer app at 4shared.com/developer and enter the Consumer Key and Secret below.

connection.logoutOnDisconnectDesc: Terminate MEGAcmd session when closing connection
connection.megaRequirementDesc: This feature requires the free MEGAcmd tool installed and running on your system.

oauth.createAppInstructions: You need to create an OAuth2 app with {provider} and enter the credentials below.

connection.securityEncryption: Optional master password with Argon2id key derivation
connection.securityKeyring: AES-256-GCM encrypted vault — stored locally on your device
connection.securityNoSend: No cloud sync, no telemetry — your data stays on your machine
connection.securityTLS: TLS 1.3 / SSH encryption for all connections
connection.selectProtocolPrompt: Select a protocol above to configure your connection
connection.selectProviderPrompt: Select a provider above or choose "Custom" for manual configuration
connection.sessionKeysStored: Session keys stored securely in system keyring
connection.title: Connect to Server

contextMenu.enterArchivePassword: This archive is encrypted. Enter password:
contextMenu.importMegaPrompt: Paste a MEGA public link to import:

cryptomator.description: Open a Cryptomator vault (format 8) to browse and decrypt files.
cryptomator.name: Name
cryptomator.readOnly: Read-only mode — vault creation coming in v2.1
cryptomator.title: Cryptomator Vault

logs.emptyMessage: Console output will appear here when Debug Mode is active.

network.noActivity: No network activity yet. Transfer files to see events.

dependencies.footer: Version data from crates.io API. Versions shown are resolved (Cargo.lock) versions.
dependencies.title: Dependencies

devtools.noPanelsActive: No panels active. Click the buttons above to show Editor, Terminal, or AI Chat.
devtools.title: DevTools

terminalPanel.newShellPrompt: Click "Start" to launch a new shell.

editorPanel.emptyState: Right-click on a file and choose "Edit"

previewPanel.emptyState: Right-click on a file and choose "Preview"

diskUsage.hoverHint: Hover over a block to see details
diskUsage.title: Disk Usage

duplicates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} duplicate files?
duplicates.title: Find Duplicates

error.description: AeroFTP encountered an unexpected error. You can try to recover or reload the application.
error.title: Something went wrong

folderOverwrite.description: The destination folder already exists. Choose how to handle files inside:
folderOverwrite.title: Folder Already Exists

lockScreen.securityNote: Your data is protected with AES-256-GCM encryption

masterPassword.setupInfo: Your credentials are already encrypted. The master password adds an extra layer of protection — you'll need to enter it when the app starts or after inactivity.
masterPassword.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

migration.keyringDetected: OS Keychain detected - credentials will be securely stored
migration.skipWarning: Skipping will leave your credentials in plaintext files
migration.title: Secure Credential Migration
migration.vaultMode: Using encrypted vault with master password
migration.warning: Your credentials are stored in plaintext
migration.warningDetail: Passwords and tokens will be migrated to your OS keychain for secure storage.

audio.loadFailed: Failed to load audio file. The file may be too large or the format is unsupported.
audio.playbackFailed: Playback failed. Try clicking play again.
audio.shortcuts: Space: Play/Pause • ←→: Skip • ↑↓: Volume • E: EQ • C: Cyber Mode • V: Visualizer

common.notSupported: This file type is not supported for preview

pdf.downloadMessage: Download the PDF to view it in your preferred reader.

preview.clickToViewDetails: Click on a file to view its details

properties.checksumFolderNA: Checksums are not available for folders
properties.name: Name

protocol.aerocloudTooltip: Turn any FTP server into your personal cloud with automatic sync
protocol.azureAuthHelp: Use Account Name as username and Access Key as password. Alternatively, leave password empty and provide a SAS token in the endpoint field.
protocol.azureTooltip: Azure Blob Storage - Shared Key or SAS token authentication
protocol.encryptionExplicitIfAvailable: Use explicit FTP over TLS if available
protocol.ftpTooltip: FTP with configurable TLS encryption. Supports Explicit, Implicit (FTPS), and opportunistic modes.
protocol.ftpWarningDesc: FTP transmits credentials and data in plain text. Consider using FTPS or SFTP for a secure connection.
protocol.googledriveTooltip: Google Drive - 15GB free storage, OAuth2 authentication
protocol.keyPassphraseHelp: Leave empty if key is not encrypted
protocol.onedriveTooltip: Microsoft OneDrive - 5GB free storage, OAuth2 authentication
protocol.pcloudRegionHelp: Select the region matching your pCloud account registration.
protocol.s3Tooltip: S3-compatible storage - AWS S3, MinIO, Cloudflare R2, Backblaze B2
protocol.sftpTooltip: SFTP over SSH - secure shell file transfer, supports key authentication
protocol.sshAuthHelp: Leave empty to use password authentication. For key-based auth, provide your private key path.
protocol.webdavNote: WebDAV path should include the full path to your files. For Nextcloud use:
protocol.webdavTooltip: WebDAV protocol - compatible with Nextcloud, CloudMe, Koofr, Synology NAS
protocol.insecureCertConfirmFirst: Warning: you are about to accept invalid/self-signed certificates. This weakens connection security. Continue?
protocol.insecureCertConfirmSecond: Final confirmation: proceed with insecure certificate mode?

savedServers.foursharedConfigError: Please configure 4shared credentials in Settings > Cloud Providers.
savedServers.oauthConfigError: Please configure {provider} credentials in Settings > Cloud Providers.

settings.aerocloudInfo: Turn any FTP/FTPS server into your personal cloud. Configure sync folders, intervals, and conflict resolution.
settings.analyticsDesc: Help improve AeroFTP by sharing: app version, language, and OS. No personal data or server information is ever collected.
settings.appBackgroundPatternDesc: Choose a subtle pattern for the main app background
settings.autoLockDesc: Lock the app automatically after this period of inactivity (0 = disabled)
settings.autoThemeDesc: Automatically switch between Light and Dark based on your system preference
settings.cloudProviderDesc: Configure cloud storage providers. AeroCloud uses your FTP server, OAuth2 providers need API credentials.
settings.confirmRemovePassword: Are you sure you want to remove master password protection? Your credentials will still be stored securely, but the app will no longer require a password to open.
settings.connectionTimeoutDesc: Time before connection attempt times out
settings.doubleClickDesc: What happens when you double-click a file
settings.exportKeystoreDesc: Export all encrypted credentials to a backup file
settings.ftpModeDesc: Passive mode works better behind NAT/firewalls
settings.importKeystoreDesc: Import credentials from a backup file
settings.includeCredentialsHint: Passwords and API keys will be encrypted in the file
settings.launchOnStartupDesc: Automatically start AeroFTP when your computer boots. Recommended if you use AeroCloud Sync.
settings.linuxBadgeDesc: Show sync status badges on files in Nautilus, Nemo, and other file managers.
settings.masterPasswordDesc: Protect AeroFTP with a master password. The app will lock after inactivity and require your password to unlock.
settings.migrationDesc: AeroFTP found unencrypted data that should be moved to the encrypted vault for maximum security.
settings.noSavedServersDesc: Add servers from the connection screen
settings.oauthConnectionDesc: Authentication is managed via browser. Configure credentials in Settings → Cloud Providers.
settings.oauthNote: OAuth2 credentials are stored locally in your encrypted vault and never sent to AeroFTP servers.
settings.overwriteIfDifferent: Overwrite if date or size differs
settings.passwordRequirements: Minimum 8 characters. Use a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols for best security.
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
settings.preserveTimestampsDesc: Keep original modification dates when transferring
settings.privacyDesc: Control your data and privacy settings
settings.privacyRespect: AeroFTP respects your privacy. We collect minimal data to improve the application.
settings.rememberLastFolderDesc: Open the last visited local folder on startup
settings.restartRequired: Restart may be required for full effect
settings.securityArgon2: Argon2id key derivation (128 MiB memory, 4 iterations)
settings.securityLocal: Passwords are stored locally on your device
settings.securityNoSend: No credentials are ever sent to external servers
settings.securityOAuth: OAuth tokens use secure file storage
settings.securityTLS: All connections use encryption when available
settings.showStatusBarDesc: Display connection info and statistics at the bottom
settings.showSystemMenuBarDesc: Show the native File/Edit/View menu at the top of the window
settings.sortFoldersFirstDesc: Show directories before files in the file list
settings.themeCyberDesc: Neon green matrix aesthetic with emerald accents
settings.themeDarkDesc: Easy on the eyes with a dark gray palette
settings.themeDesc: Choose a visual theme for the application
settings.themeLightDesc: Clean and bright for well-lit environments
settings.themeTokyoDesc: Inspired by Tokyo nightlife with purple hues
settings.title: Settings
settings.toastNotificationsDesc: Display popup notifications for actions (errors always shown). Activity Log is always available.
settings.transferModeDesc: Auto mode detects file type and chooses appropriately
settings.upToDateAlert:
Up to date!

Running AeroFTP v{version}
settings.visibleColumnsDesc: Choose which columns to display in the file list view
settings.windowsBadgeDesc: Sync badges are managed automatically via Windows Cloud Filter API. Explorer shows native sync status icons when AeroCloud is active.

shortcuts.helpText: Press [F1] anytime to show this dialog
shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts

support.subtitle: Your support helps keep AeroFTP free!
support.title: Support AeroFTP

syncPanel.clickCompare: Click "Compare Now" to scan for differences
syncPanel.descBidirectional: Checks differences in both directions: downloads newer remote files and uploads newer local files.
syncPanel.descLocalToRemote: Checks which local files are newer and uploads them to the remote server.
syncPanel.descRemoteToLocal: Checks which remote files are newer and downloads them to the local folder.
syncPanel.indexAvailableTooltip: A sync index from a previous sync is available — conflict detection is enhanced
syncPanel.title: Synchronize Files

toast.cloudConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to cloud server: {error}
toast.connectionLostManual: Could not reconnect. Please reconnect manually.
toast.fillEndpointCreds: Please fill in endpoint and credentials
toast.fillServerUser: Please fill in server and username

trash.emptyConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all items in the Trash?
trash.title: Trash

ui.editPathNav: Click to edit path, Enter to navigate
ui.localPathMismatch: Local path doesn't match the connected server

cyberTools.title: Security Tools
cyberTools.hashDescription: Calculate cryptographic hashes for text or files
cyberTools.hashNoInput: Enter text or select a file
cyberTools.cryptoDescription: Encrypt and decrypt text with military-grade algorithms
cyberTools.cryptoKdfInfo: Key derivation: Argon2id (64 MB / t=3 / p=4)
cyberTools.cryptoDecryptFailed: Decryption failed — wrong password or corrupted data
cyberTools.pwdNoCharset: Select at least one character set

vault.description: AeroVault lets you create AES-256 encrypted containers to securely store your files.
vault.descriptionV2: AeroVault v2 provides military-grade encryption with nonce misuse-resistant AES-256-GCM-SIV and optional cascade encryption.
vault.empty: Vault is empty. Add files to get started.
vault.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
vault.title: AeroVault
